wikipedia_page.main:
Arthur Mapp (born 6 November 1953) is a British former judoka who competed in the 1980 Summer Olympics. He was born in British Honduras.
At the time of his Olympic success, Arthur Mapp was serving with the British Army as a Corporal in the Royal Army Pay Corps.
